thread.title: NICOLA STURGEON SAYS CUSTOMS UNION OFFERS BEST FUTURE FOR SCOTTISH TRADING RELATIONSHIPS

title: NICOLA STURGEON SAYS CUSTOMS UNION OFFERS BEST FUTURE FOR SCOTTISH TRADING RELATIONSHIPS
text:
CUSTOMS UNION OFFERS BEST FUTURE FOR SCOTTISH TRADING RELATIONSHIPS 3:55pm EDT - 00:43
Nicola Sturgeon speaking at 2018 says that she hopes the UK continues to be in a customs union with the European Union. She says if the government can deliver no hard border for Ireland then they should be able to do the same for Scotland.
Nicola Sturgeon speaking at 2018 says that she hopes the UK continues to be in a customs union with the European Union. She says if the government can deliver no hard border for Ireland then they should be able to do the same for Scotland. //www.reuters.com/video/2018/05/14/nicola-sturgeon-says-customs-union-offer?videoId=426912109&videoChannel=14073
